name: Brothaz Grimm-Blasphemy at its Best
description: Brothaz Grimm's first album release is one of the most Blasphemous releases in hip hop Devil Shyt to date, with production comparable to the "old Three Six Mafia" and delivery and flows like Lord Infamous, Tech N9ne, and Bone Thugs, Brothaz Grimm slays the masses with truly unholy content. 15 tracks of nonstop evil and music to pound in your trunk featuring production from Shy One, Homie Beats, Hoodkilla, R.I.T. and plenty more. Also with engineering and mastering from Ressurrector you can't go wrong. Get your copy today of this "soon to be cult classic" of the underground. \m/
